comment:
>>44310982
“How is a bag of holding made?” You ask.

“I do not know. Someone who is more familiar with magic arts might. These bags were first made by a Precursor, and are in limited supply now.” The owl says. “If you carry many bags, be sure to label them carefully. I've heard they can cause dangerous things to happen.”

> [[ You spent 1 EXP on Two-handed Mastery. ]]
> [[ Offensive Mastery 4 offers a choice from: ]]
* Critical Threat // Passive // Slightly increases critical strike range. Required for: "Fleshrend", "Unarmed Fighter".
* Dual Wield Mastery // Passive // Increases the chance to hit with a weapon wielded in the off-hand. Required for "Cross Strike", "Titan's Grip".
* Whirlwind Attack // Active // Spend PP to make a barreling attack that deals damage to all targets in your weapon's reach.
* Overpower // Active // After an opponent dodges, spend PP to break their guard with an attack of increased speed and effectiveness. Required for “Combat Expertise”.
* Charge // Active // Spend PP to charge toward a target opponent, attempting to push through or navigate all obstacles between the two of you. Required for “Duel”, “Instantaneous Movement”.
* Titan's Strength // Passive // The user can comfortably wield a two-handed melee weapon in a single hand. Reduces buildup of Fatigue when wielding oversized weapons. Required for “Titan's Grip”.

You purchase five healing potions, for 400#. This leaves you with 804#.

What will you do?
> Buy something else.
> Chat with the owl.
> Talk to Andor. (Write-in.)
> Leave the general store.
name: Sylvetica
